name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of full stack development experience, I excel in creating robust and secure applications with a strong focus on **Ruby on Rails** for backend development and integrating **APIs** effectively. My technical expertise includes designing and implementing **event flows** and ensuring **authentication** and **authorization** protocols, along with managing **webhooks**, **rate limits**, and **retries** to optimize system performance. I bring a comprehensive understanding of **idempotency** to enhance application resilience.

I have successfully led technical strategy initiatives and architected scalable solutions that incorporate **AI services** for intelligent automation. My approach integrates strong **observability** practices, **caching** strategies, and adherence to **data contracts** while facilitating **schema evolution** to accommodate changes seamlessly.

In addition to my technical prowess, I have a proven track record of mentoring junior developers, conducting thorough **code reviews**, and ensuring compliance with security standards. My experience in leveraging collaboration tools like **Slack** and **Microsoft Teams** enhances my ability to work within cross-functional teams, driving successful project outcomes.
